Uses of Class
com.alberto.networkmap.UTMLocation

    • Uses of UTMLocation in com.alberto.networkmap

      Methods in com.alberto.networkmap with parameters of type UTMLocation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void UTMLocation.copy(UTMLocation oLocation)
      This method copy a given UTMLocation into the current UTMLocation
      boolean NetworkMapDataSource.existsBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation)
      This method states whether or not exist a row into the table bandwidth_map for the given location
      boolean NetworkMapDataSource.existsPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation)
      This method states whether or not exist a row into the table paths_bandwidth_map for the transition represented for the given locations
      void NetworkMapDataSource.insertBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation, float bandwidth)
      This method insert a new network performance sample into the table bandwidth_map
      void NetworkMapDataSource.insertPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation, float probability)
      This method insert a new row in the table paths_bandwidth_map representing a transaction between two locations
      boolean UTMLocation.isEqual(UTMLocation oLocation)
      This method compare two UTMLocation
      Cursor NetworkMapDataSource.selectAllPath(UTMLocation startLocation)
      This method retrieves all the transitions that start in the given location
      Cursor NetworkMapDataSource.selectBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation)
      This method retrieves the data stored in the table bandwidth_map for the given location
      Cursor NetworkMapDataSource.selectMostLikelyPath(UTMLocation startLocation)
      This method retrieves the most likely transition for the starting given location
      Cursor NetworkMapDataSource.selectPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation)
      This method select the data for the transition stored in the table paths_bandwidth_map
      void NetworkMapDataSource.updateBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation, float bandwidth)
      This method update a network performance estimate with the info of the new sample into the table bandwidth_map
      void NetworkMapDataSource.updateProbabilityPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation, float probability)
      This method updates a row of the table paths_bandwidth_map with the new data for the transition represented in that row
      void NetworkMapDataSource.updateTimesPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation)
      This method updates the field Times into the table paths_bandwidth_map which represents the number of times that a transition between locations has been detected
